parameters.name: serviceId
parameters.description: This indicates the id of the TSA.SERVICE

parameters.name: serverName
parameters.description: Hostname of the Server on which the service will run

parameters.name: serverStatus
parameters.description: Status of Server

parameters.name: workloadProfileId
parameters.description: Indicates the TSA.WORKLOAD profile Id

parameters.name: processStatus
parameters.description: Indicates whether process is started or finished

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the company, following the format CCGGGLLLL, where: CC is the country code, GGG is Company Group Code and LLLL is the Local Code. Country Code must be a valid countryCode, Company Group Code must be 3 numeric characters in the range 001-999 and must be a valid companyGroup. The Local Code is 4 numeric characters in the range 0001-9999, e.g. GB0010001

parameters.name: cobDate
parameters.description: Indicates date on which cob run

verificationJobId.description: Same as jobID, but functionally it does the verififcation as to whether a job is completed before the jobID is executed

jobFrequency.description: Defines the frequency at which the job is processed next.

serviceControl.description: Indicates whether service is in START,STOP,AUTO

processStatus.description: Indicates whether process is started or finished
